medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent epigastric and RUQ abdominal pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has experienced at least 5 similar episodes over the last year, with three occurring this month. Symptoms began again this morning at 9 am, now associated with nausea and vomiting. Pain has improved since arriving in the ED, though still present.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with cholelithiasis s/p lap chole. No known GI cancers.
